alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Livingston; Monroe; Orleans (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 28 at 3:29PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT THE ROCHESTER METRO AREA AND POINTS SOUTH INCLUDING MULTIPLE INTERSTATE HIGHWAYS FOR THE EVENING COMMUTE... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 326 PM EST, a snow squall was Churchville and Chili moving east at 10 MPH. The snow squall will move across Interstate 490, Interstate 390, and Interstate 90 through 500 PM EST. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Rochester, Chili, Brockport, Brighton, Gates-North Gates, Henrietta, Spencerport, Honeoye Falls, Scottsville, Churchville, Holley, Riga, Clarendon, Rush, Pittsford, Bergen, Strong Memorial Hospital, North Chili, Martin, and Rochester International Airport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 390 between exits 11 and 12. Interstate 90 near exit 46. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&
